snippet.title: Super Monkey Ball Banana Mania Kazuma Kiryu Character Trailer
snippet.description:
Kazuma Kiryu is jumping from the streets of Kamurocho into Super Monkey Ball! He'll be collecting bottles of Staminan X instead of bananas in Super Monkey Ball Banana Mania.

Kazuma Kiryu will be free and unlockable on all platforms including Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Steam, Xbox One, and Xbox Series S|X on October 5, 2021!
